<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/roles"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Store a new role on the Panel and return an HTTP/201 response code with the
new role attached.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
